About Me
In this section you're going to get an insight of who I am.

The face behind the mask

My name is Seun Adetunji a Chemistry Graduate, Amateur Boxer and Avid Learner with a passion for web development. I begun learning web development after my degree as I wished to pursue a career I could learn new skills. Thus i began learning the fundamentals of web development HTML, CSS and JavaScript. When learning these languages I created an unexpected passion for web development and want to make my new found passion become a career.

Chemistry Bsc Graduate

I'm a recent Chemistry graduate from university of Kent from the class of 2019. From this degree I was first Introduced to programming during my first year using the Fortran-90 language. I gained and enhanced my analysis and problem solving skills during my years studying Chemistry in university.

Amateur boxer

During my Spare time i participate in amateur boxing. I do it in order to keep myself fit and sharpend my reflexes and tools. I throughly enjoy the sport and have learned life long benefits from boxing such as displine, self control and time managment.

Avid Learner

Throughout my years I've always been an avid learner. Learning from a range of different topics such as Russian history, Music, Nigerian History and combat sports greats.
